what: Useful Tools for Daily NEAR Work Tasks
title: Useful Tools for Daily NEAR Work Tasks
text: many repetitive works data harmonization keeping track communication researchers. goal creating package practice “don’t repeat ” (DRY) principle, making daily work handy.

title: Useful Tools for Daily NEAR Work Tasks
text: package contains functions follows: sav_to_csv: Convert SPSS data files (.sav) csv files. conversion needed maelstrom harmonization package read .sav data. function can prevent repetitive work converting .sav .csv one one. details please see description ?sav_to_csv() pretty_template: Automatically create ‘rmd’ folder, create & open rmd file nice looking template. facilitates communication researchers & tracking records. default complies html file. details please see description ?pretty_template(). information R markdown please see . continued….

title: Useful Tools for Daily NEAR Work Tasks
text: can install development version neartools GitHub :

title: Useful Tools for Daily NEAR Work Tasks
code: # load the package library(neartools)  # check function's documentation ?sav_to_csv() ?pretty_template()  # conver data files sav_to_csv("original_data", "SNAC-K")  # initiate a rmd file  pretty_template(name = "Reply to Prof XXX", output_file = "word")

title: pretty_template — pretty_template
text: Use skeleton.Rmd starting analysis. function creates new folder "rmd" root project create rmd file nice-looking template .

title: pretty_template — pretty_template
text: name name rmd file. (need add suffix ".Rmd") output_file "word" "html", default "html" open file opened created ... arguments passed use_template

what: Transform the SPSS data files to csv files — sav_to_csv
title: Transform the SPSS data files to csv files — sav_to_csv
text: Maelstrom harmonization package, command 'mlstr_file_index_read()' read study specific data sets. can read commonly used .csv, .dta files, .sav (SPSS) data. Therefore function can help user transform sav data sets csv data, instead using 'read_sav()' function transform every data set one one manually.

title: Transform the SPSS data files to csv files — sav_to_csv
Transform the SPSS data files to csv files — sav_to_csv
text: data_folder_name name folder data stored. db_name name specific database's folder, located `data_folder_name`.

title: Transform the SPSS data files to csv files — sav_to_csv
text: folder called "csv_format" generated 'db_name's folder, storing transformed csv files.

title: Transform the SPSS data files to csv files — sav_to_csv
text: Assume bunch `.sav` files current working directory: "original_data/SNAC-K". may want transform `.csv` files can recognized Maelstrom harmonization package. running function, new folder "csv_format" storing transformed SNAC-K csv files "original_data/SNAC-K".

title: Transform the SPSS data files to csv files — sav_to_csv
text: Please make sure `original_data` folder current working directory.

title: Transform the SPSS data files to csv files — sav_to_csv
